# The `UnrollingPreferences` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Parameters that control the generic loop unrolling transformation.

### Count {#a19cc5df79c699ab1e137118b8c472a9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::Count">
A forced unrolling factor (the number of concatenated bodies of the original loop in the unrolled loop body).

When set to 0, the unrolling transformation will select an unrolling factor based on the current cost threshold and other factors.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00570">570</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.

### FullUnrollMaxCount {#ac9d35cceaeac03c999997e0b4d3ebcb6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::FullUnrollMaxCount">
Set the maximum unrolling factor for full unrolling.

Like MaxCount, but applies even if full unrolling is selected. This allows a target to fall back to Partial unrolling if full unrolling is above FullUnrollMaxCount.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00585">585</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.

Don&#39;t allow loop unrolling to simulate more than this number of iterations when checking full unroll profitability.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00619">619</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.

### MaxPercentThresholdBoost {#a63a7a13b9f772e6c656e94fb7e251d46}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::MaxPercentThresholdBoost">
If complete unrolling will reduce the cost of the loop, we will boost the Threshold by a certain percent to allow more aggressive complete unrolling.

This value provides the maximum boost percentage that we can apply to Threshold (The value should be no less than 100). BoostedThreshold = Threshold &#42; min(RolledCost / UnrolledCost, MaxPercentThresholdBoost / 100) E.g. if complete unrolling reduces the loop execution time by 50% then we boost the threshold by the factor of 2x. If unrolling is not expected to reduce the running time, then we do not increase the threshold.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00555">555</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### MaxUpperBound {#afc0d01a3d1fda6a5702b045b4bcfa56c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::MaxUpperBound">
Set the maximum upper bound of trip count.

Allowing the MaxUpperBound to be overrided by a target gives more flexiblity on certain cases. By default, MaxUpperBound uses UnrollMaxUpperBound which value is 8.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00581">581</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RuntimeUnrollMultiExit {#a75cdb3cba77995d63d624a2d632ed2e3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::RuntimeUnrollMultiExit">
Allow runtime unrolling multi-exit loops.

Should only be set if the target determined that multi-exit unrolling is profitable for the loop. Fall back to the generic logic to determine whether multi-exit unrolling is profitable if set to false.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00629">629</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::SCEVExpansionBudget">
Don&#39;t allow runtime unrolling if expanding the trip count takes more than SCEVExpansionBudget.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00624">624</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Threshold {#a21e7febf468c370793f606da5cd0e6fe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::Threshold">
The cost threshold for the unrolled loop.

Should be relative to the getInstructionCost values returned by this API, and the expectation is that the unrolled loop&#39;s instructions when run through that interface should not exceed this cost. However, this is only an estimate. Also, specific loops may be unrolled even with a cost above this threshold if deemed profitable. Set this to UINT&#95;MAX to disable the loop body cost restriction.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00544">544</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### UnrollAndJam {#abbdf27d466fda1df8f9ce6f256026cce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::UnrollAndJam">
Allow unroll and jam. Used to enable unroll and jam for the target.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00611">611</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### UnrollAndJamInnerLoopThreshold {#a83395d28f9c1d9063aa6d9eb40dd2e7a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::TargetTransformInfo::UnrollingPreferences::UnrollAndJamInnerLoopThreshold">
Threshold for unroll and jam, for inner loop size.

The &#39;Threshold&#39; value above is used during unroll and jam for the outer loop size. This value is used in the same manner to limit the size of the inner loop.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h/#l00616">616</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>
